tool_description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc…
name: G - Finance
title: G - Finance

api_list.name: market-trends

required_parameters.name: t
required_parameters.description:
Tab name. One of these:

indexes
most-active
gainers
losers
climate-leaders
cryptocurrencies
currencies

optional_parameters.name: s
optional_parameters.description:
Subtab name. If you selected the indexes tab, you can choose one of the following, leave empty to get all.

americas
europe-middle-east-africa
asia-pacific

api_list.name: ticker

required_parameters.name: t
required_parameters.description:
Ticker symbol. For example:

ABNB:NASDAQ
.DJI:INDEXDJX
EUR-USD
BTC-USD

api_list.name: search
